ItemFound: ^I can’t believe what this mage has done to you, my boy. I'll never let you leave my sight again.
^I don’t know how I could possibly repay you.
^Do you know where I could find the mage?
^I saw a shadowy figure earlier, creeping down into the dark under the village. It could have been the mage.
^I'm not sure, but if you go looking for them... be safe.
